nodes.bodyText:
I've rewritten almost of all this implementation because we should consider psr-12. (parameters and lexical variables were not wrapped.)
Formatting problems related to closures are likely to occur in an array/parameters. So especially, I've added unit tests for in arrays.
All existing unit tests also have passed. I just hope that there is no big problem...

Well, we will see :)
If the tests pass, let's wait. It would be fine if there was an easy way to fix possible issues once a new version of NetBeans is released.
